text: Press %action% for an action.
To talk with a person or to open a chest or door.
Press %inventory% to see your inventory,
along with your equipment, stats, skills and spells.
Press %logbook% to see your logbook.
Here you can see everything quest related.
Coming near an enemy will start a battle.
By winning battles, you'll earn XP,
which you can use to improve your character.
Keep %slow% pressed to move stealthily.
Enemies will detect you less easy.
This way you can avoid battles, but you also won't be receiving XP from said battles.
Press %minimap% in large areas to see an overview of that area.
This way it's hard to get lost, like in dark caves.
Press %inventory% to see your inventory.
Here you can equip items that will give you more protection in battles like this item.
You can also switch to different weapons, if you have them in your inventory.
Keep %fast% pressed to run.
You'll be faster, but enemies will detect you much sooner.
(As opposed to stealth movement %slow% where enemies wil detect you less easy.)
Remember, press %logbook% to see your logbook.
Here you can see everything quest related.
The closet behind you can be used for storage.
When your inventory becomes full, put your items in your closet.
They will be kept there and they will be safe.
